Package variants_lib.data

Class VariantsLibFleetFactory

java.lang.Object
variants_lib.data.VariantsLibFleetFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
TestFleetFactory
public class VariantsLibFleetFactory extends Object
Generates fleets specified by fleet jsons. Contains both the fields from the fleet json and the logic for creating fleets

  • Constructor Details

    • VariantsLibFleetFactory

      public VariantsLibFleetFactory()
      Create a VariantsLibFleetFactory with fields set to some default values. The resulting factory won't be able to create fleets and needs to be initialized (ie. by calling initializeFromJson())

    • VariantsLibFleetFactory

      public VariantsLibFleetFactory​(org.json.JSONObject fleetJson, org.json.JSONObject fleetJsonCsvRow, String modOfOrigin) throws Exception
      Create a VariantsLibFleetFactory. Calls initializeFromJson()
      Parameters:
      fleetJson - The fleet json
      fleetJsonCsvRow - The fleet json's row in fleets.csv
      modOfOrigin - The mod the fleet json is from
      Throws:
      Exception - An exception containing some message on fields that are set to invalid values or failed to load

  • Method Details

    • initializeFromJson

      public void initializeFromJson​(org.json.JSONObject fleetJson, org.json.JSONObject fleetJsonCsvRow, String modOfOrigin) throws Exception
      Initialize the fields of this factory based of the JSON parameters.
      Parameters:
      fleetJson - The fleet json
      fleetJsonCsvRow - The fleet json's row in fleets.csv
      modOfOrigin - The mod the fleet json is from
      Throws:
      Exception - An exception containing some message on fields that are set to invalid values or failed to load

    • pickFleetFactory

      public static VariantsLibFleetFactory pickFleetFactory​(VariantsLibFleetParams params)
      Choose a random fleet to spawn based on spawn weights in factions.csv
      Parameters:
      params - Specifications to base selection on (ie. don't choose a fleet with a minDP of 100 when trying to make a 50 dp fleet)
      Returns:
      a fleet factory that meets specifications, or null if no factories could be found

      Create a fleet
      Parameters:
      fleetAPI - Some empty CampaignFleetAPI which will contain the new fleet
      params - Params on how to generate fleet
      membersToKeep - Ships to always add to the fleet

      Choose fleet members to give officers, with the first in the list being the flagship
      Parameters:
      vars - vars for providing selection of fleet members to officer
      params - params used to generate fleet
      Returns:
      list of fleet members to give officers with first being the flagship

      Parameters:
      params - params used to make fleet

      rand - random number generator used

    • addRandomSModsToVariant

      protected void addRandomSModsToVariant​(com.fs.starfarer.api.characters.PersonAPI captain, com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.ShipVariantAPI variant, Random rand, int numSMods)
      Adds random(ish) hullMods to a variant. First tries to build in existing hullmods, then random hullmods that are generally useful. Tries filling any unused dp
      Parameters:
      captain -
      variant -
      rand -
      numSMods -

    • attemptToAddHullMod

      protected boolean attemptToAddHullMod​(com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.ShipVariantAPI variant, String hullMod, com.fs.starfarer.api.characters.PersonAPI captain, boolean smod)
      Add hullmod if present
      Parameters:
      variant -
      hullMod -
      captain -
      smod - true to add as a smod, false otherwise
      Returns:
      whether the hullmod was not present before and successfully added
